title: SHROUD OF TURIN from “COAST TO COAST AM” on YouTube and Show’s Website
post:
I am an old fan of George Noory, and his full team of specialists in various fields. Since
working in security, I had the pleasure of listening to most of the information that’s very
interesting, informative, and accurate.
I thank Coast to Coast, and all of its Staff, for all the trouble taken to assimilate and sift,
and then broadcast for the thousands of your fans.
Sincerely,
Guy 
(navy67228guy@yahoo.com)
author: Guy Joseph
